programIndicators.name: Days since Last VL (0 indicates never tested)
Eligible for VL
programIndicators.description: 1 if eligible with no VL recorded, otherwise 2; evaluates 3 conditions that should be counted: 1) client has been on ART > 6 months but has no VL test; 2) client has been on ART >12 months and < 18 months and doesn't have VL test in the last 6 months and 3) client has been on ART >18 months and doesn't have VL in last 12 months.

programIndicators.name: HIV+ but never on ART
programIndicators.description: 1 if HIV+ but not on ART, 2 if HIV+ and have ART status, 3 if not HIV+
programIndicators.expression:
d2:condition('#{K42Ut4xpKVT.bvxCroxAwLk} == 1 && d2:hasValue(#{Gxrus0FJbjY.r3UGeljqNxM})', 2, d2:condition('A{tmruMXIFo2s}== 1 && d2:hasValue(#{Gxrus0FJbjY.r3UGeljqNxM})',2,
d2:condition('(A{tmruMXIFo2s}!= 1 && #{K42Ut4xpKVT.bvxCroxAwLk} != 1) || (A{tmruMXIFo2s}!=1 && !d2:hasValue(#{K42Ut4xpKVT.bvxCroxAwLk})) ',3,
d2:condition('A{tmruMXIFo2s}== 1 && !d2:hasValue(#{Gxrus0FJbjY.r3UGeljqNxM})',1,
d2:condition('#{K42Ut4xpKVT.bvxCroxAwLk} == 1 && !d2:hasValue(#{Gxrus0FJbjY.r3UGeljqNxM})',1,0)))))
